- Gain (Charge Barrier # x 3) Shield.
- Lose 1 Charge Barrier after losing (Charge Barrier # x 3) Shield.
- (If the unit is a W Corp. employee, ALL Charge Barrier effects activate at (Charge Barrier # x 5) instead of at (Charge Barrier # x 3))
- Turn End: Gain a Charge Count for each Charge Barrier #, and Charge Barrier and Shield gained from Charge Barrier expire completely next turn

dataList.name: Slash Power Up
dataList.desc: Slash skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

- Discarded Skills will not activate Skill effects or Coin effects other than effects from Discard, and will not give E.G.O resources.

dataList.name: Insight
dataList.desc: The rank of the last Skill Discarded by the unit with this effect (Base Value: 1)

dataList.name: Unjust Enrichment

- When 'Bullets are Pricey' Passive activates, consume all Unjust Enrichment stack to deal bonus damage

dataList.name: Resentment
dataList.desc:
If the enemy with the <sprite name="RetaliationBook"><color=#e30000><link="RetaliationBook">Vengeance Mark</color></link></u> is hit by an attack, this effect expires at Attack End.
Expires at the end of the turn

dataList.name: Vengeance Mark

dataList.name: Pierce Power Up

- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when other unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

dataList.name: Declared Duel - Outis
dataList.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when other unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

dataList.name: Declared Duel - Sinclair
dataList.desc:

- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when another unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

dataList.name: Single Combat
dataList.desc: Established when the attacked Slot is targeted by a single unit, and only by that single unit. This condition is established only between the attacking unit and the attacked Slot. (Does not apply to reused Skills)

- [Lobotomy E.G.O::Magic Bullet Outis Only]
· The higher the value, the higher the Base Power and Coin Power of Skill 3

dataList.name: Dark Flame

- Max Value: 7

- Turn End: Deal (Value x Burn on target) Pride Affinity damage, then expires

dataList.desc:

- Modify Skill pool: Gain 1 use of Skill 3, but lose 1 use of Skill 1

dataList.desc:
- If unit A applies this effect to unit B: Unit B follows up with an Unopposed Attack with its Skill 1 against the same enemy Unit A attacked with its Skill. Activates at Unit A's Attack End.
- The Skill used as an Assist Attack does not affect Unit B's upcoming Skills list.

dataList.name: Reverse Compulsion
dataList.desc: Heal 15 SP at every Turn Start

dataList.name: Pride Power Up
dataList.desc: Pride Skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Sword of the Homeland - Rending

dataList.name: Sword of the Homeland - Penetrating
dataList.desc: Skill 2 gains Final Power by the effect’s Count for this turn.

- When at 7+ Poise, upon Skill use, Skill 3 deals +(30/# of Coins)% damage and deals +(50/# of Coins)% damage on Critical Hit

dataList.name: Remembrance

dataList.name: Red Plum Blossom

- Reduce value by 1 when hit
dataList.summary: Higher chance to be Critically Hit; take more damage upon Critical Hit

dataList.name: Tremor - Decay
dataList.desc:
Lose 1 Defense Level for every 4 Tremor Potency on self
When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raises or reduces Tremor Potency/Count)

dataList.name: Echoes of the Manor
dataList.desc:
- 50% chance to gain +1 Sinking Count when gaining Sinking Potency or Count from Skill or Coin effects
- Units with SP: Change Panic Type to Echoes of the Manor. When this unit Panics, inflict 2 Echoes of the Manor to 2 random other allies of this unit next turn
- Units without SP: -10% chance to flip Heads
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End
This effect is not cumulative; inflicting it will replace the current value with the inflicted value.
※ Apply the "Units without SP" conditional to certain enemies that have SP but can't change their Panic Types.

dataList.name: Amplitude Conversion
dataList.desc:
Converts Tremor or already converted Tremor on target to a different type of Tremor.
Potency and Count values do not change over the conversion.

dataList.name: Gloom Power Up
dataList.desc: Gloom Skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Tremor - Fracture
dataList.desc:
- เมื่อติด Stagger และค่าพลังกับระยะเวลาสถานะ Tremor รวมแล้ว ≥ 20 จะเพิ่มระดับ Stagger ให้รุนแรงขึ้น 1 ขั้น
- ไม่สามารถเพิ่ม Stagger เกินระดับสูงสุดได้ด้วยเอฟเฟกต์นี้

เมื่อถูกโจมตีด้วยสกิลที่กระตุ้น Tremor Burst จะเพิ่มค่า Stagger Threshold ตามค่าพลังของสถานะนี้
จบเทิร์น: ลดระยะเวลาสถานะลง 1 เทิร์น

(มีปฏิกิริยาเหมือนสถานะแรงสั่นทั่วไปเมื่อต้องเพิ่มหรือลดค่าพลัง/ระยะเวลาสถานะ)

dataList.name: เบื่องหน้าราชัน
dataList.desc:
เมื่อยูนิตนี้โจมตีด้วยสกิลที่มีน้ำหนักการโจมตี 1 , หากโจมตีโดน จะสร้างความเสียหายเสริมเท่ากับ 50% ของค่าเหรียญ (ต่อการโจมตี) แก่ศัตรูที่ยังสามารถถูกโจมตีได้ 2 ตัวที่มี HP น้อยที่สุด
ความเสียหายเสริมจะเป็นธาตุและประเภทเดียวกับสกิลที่ใช้โจมตี

dataList.name: เบื้องหน้าราชันผู้ถูกจองจำ
dataList.desc:
เมื่อยูนิตนี้โจมตีด้วยสกิลที่มีน้ำหนักการโจมตี 1 , หากโจมตีโดน จะสร้างความเสียหายเสริมเท่ากับ 100% ของค่าเหรียญ (ต่อการโจมตี) แก่ศัตรูที่ยังสามารถถูกโจมตีได้ 2 ตัวที่มี HP น้อยที่สุด
ความเสียหายเสริมจะเป็นธาตุและประเภทเดียวกับสกิลที่ใช้โจมตี

Enhances Edgar Family Chief Butler Ryōshū Skills against targets with this effect.
Turn End: reduce the Count by 1

dataList.name: Prepared Meat
dataList.desc: If conditions are met, Fairy Queen kills this unit at Turn End

dataList.name: Hunger
dataList.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 if this unit failed to defeat an ally with Prepared Meat.
At 75%- HP, gain 2. At 50%- HP, gain 3.
Turn Start: lose 1 if this unit defeated an ally with Prepared Meat.
At 0 value, gain (# of allies defeated x 3)Attack Power Down and Defense Power Down.

dataList.name: Volatile Passion
dataList.desc:
- On Hit, inflict 1 Burn
- If the main target has Burn, Final Power +1

- Turn End: lose (# of turns spent in Volatile E.G.O state x 5) SP. (Max SP loss : 40)

dataList.name: Tremor - Reverb
dataList.desc:
- On Tremor Burst, take Sloth damage equal to Tremor Potency on self.
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1.
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

dataList.name: Blubberbubble
dataList.desc:
- This effect counts as a 'Shield Management' effect.
- Turn End: Reduce Count by 1
- This unit does not lose Shield at Turn End as long as it has the Blubberbubble effect (unless depleted by damage or effect)
- If the Shield affected by Blubberbubble breaks due to taking damage, inflict 4 Sinking Potency/Count against the attacker. (How much of that '4' value is Potency or Count is randomly determined)
- This unit can stack their Shield value by using this effect. However, as long as Blubberbubble is in effect, the Shield value cannot exceed 60% of this unit's Max HP.

dataList.name: Tremor - Everlasting
dataList.desc:
- When hit by Skills or Coin effects that trigger Tremor Burst, (Tremor Potency on self)% chance to trigger an additional Tremor Burst. (max 50%)
- When hit by Skills or Coin effects that trigger Tremor Burst, (Tremor Count on self)% chance to trigger an additional Tremor Burst. (max 50%)
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

dataList.name: Time Moratorium
dataList.desc:

- Combat End: If there is only 1 Count left of this effect, the effect triggers Tremor Burst after dealing (100 + (Stack x 15)% of stored damage as Sloth damage
- Turn End: gain 1 Stack and lose 1 Count
- The Time Moratorium will immediately expire after triggering the Tremor Burst and the Sloth damage effect if another instance of Time Moratorium is inflicted on a unit with Time Moratorium.

dataList.name: Borrowed Time
dataList.desc:
Turn End at 2+ Count:
- Gain (Borrowed Time Count - 1) Haste, Clash Power Up, and Fragile next turn
- If this unit is set to gain more Bind than Haste next turn, the Borrowed Time effect expires at the next Turn Start, and this unit gets Staggered

Turn End: At 1 Count, gain 2(Borrowed Time Stack - 1) Bind next turn
Turn End: Gain 1 Stack, lose 1 Count

dataList.name: Tremor - Chain
dataList.desc:
- Lose 1 Clash Power for every 10 Tremor Potency on self (max 3)
- When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
- (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

dataList.name: Gaze of Contempt
dataList.desc:

[Contempt of the Gaze]

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze

dataList.name: Torn Memory

dataList.name: Photoelectricity

Turn End: this effect expires

dataList.name: Coffin
dataList.desc:
- สูงสุด: 10
- เมื่อจบเทิร์น:
  - สำหรับทุก ๆ 3 หน่วย จะได้รับสถานะเพิ่มความเสียหาย 2 หน่วยในเทิร์นถัดไป (สูงสุด 6)
  - ในทุก ๆ 4 หน่วย จะเพิ่มค่า SPD ขั้นต่ำ 1 หน่วยในเทิร์นถัดไป (สูงสุด 2)

dataList.name: Wild Hunt

- เมื่อตาย จะได้รับทรัพยากร E.G.O 1 หน่วย จากประเภทที่มีอยู่น้อยที่สุด
- หากยูนิตนี้ถูกฆ่าด้วยการโจมตี จะสร้างสถานะ Sinking 3 หน่วยให้กับผู้โจมตี
- ยูนิตนี้จะตายเมื่อจบเทิร์นที่ฟื้นขึ้นมา

dataList.name: Dullahan

- จบเทิร์น: หากมีสถานะ Dullahan จะสูญเสีย SP ตาม (15 - (Coffin ÷ 2)) หน่วย (อย่างน้อย 10)

dataList.name: Impending Ruin
dataList.desc:
- Units with SP: change their Panic Type to ""Ruin"".
(Ruin: When this unit enters Low Morale state, gain 3 Sinking at every Turn End and lose 1 Clash Power. When this unit Panics, gain 5 Sinking and 3 Sinking Count at every Turn End and lose 2 Clash Power)
- Units without SP: -10% chance to flip Heads
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End
- This effect is not cumulative; inflicting it will replace the current value with the inflicted value.
※ Apply the ""Units without SP"" conditional to certain enemies that have SP but can't change their Panic Types.

dataList.desc:
- Targets with SP: Change their Panic Type to 'Ruin'
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End

- Reduced by 1 at Turn End

dataList.summary: Clash Power -1 on self. Gain 3 Sinking at every Turn End

dataList.summary: Clash Power -2 on self. Gain 5 Sinking and +3 Sinking Count at every Turn End

dataList.name: The Uninvited
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 2
- Upon death, the last attacker heals 3 SP; then, a random ally without this effect gains 2 Stacks of this effect.
- Take +0.5% damage for every Sinking on self (max 10%; for Focused Encounters, count Sinking on each Part separately)
- Turn End: reduced by 1

dataList.name: Courier Trunk - Rodion
dataList.desc:
- Base Value: 0
- Turn Start: gain 3 Stack
- Stack does not expire upon Retreat; it is stored instead
- At 10+ Stack: raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- At 20+ Stack: Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Slash Damage Up
- At 30+ Stack:
· On Skill Use, take (Stack/3)% HP damage and (Stack/3) SP damage
· On Turn End, take (Stack/2)% HP damage and (Stack/2) SP damage (applies before Retreat)

dataList.name: Strategic R&R Mode
dataList.desc:
- Turn End: recover from Stagger and Retreat from the Encounter (unless it's a forced Stagger; does not count as death)
· In Chain Battles, give this unit's Slots to a Substituted unit and move to the rearmost place in the Backup units' Deployment order (escape from the Encounter entirely if there are no other Backup Units remaining to swap places with next turn. When returning to battle, return in the order they retreated in)
· When returning to battle, return with the same amount of HP and SP this unit had when it retreated, and eliminate all effects on self for a select few (if this unit had less than 0 SP when retreating, reset SP to 0 instead)

dataList.name: Defensive Stance
dataList.desc:
- Max Value: 2
- This effect does not compound in potency; stacking it only extends its duration.
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End
- When a unit gains this effect, gain the following effects next turn:
  · Fix this unit's Speed to its minimum value
  · Gain 5 Defense Level Up
  · Each of this unit's Slots gain +(10 / this unit's # of Slots) Aggro
  · When chaining Skills, this unit can draw enemies' attack toward this unit regardless of Speed (Focused Encounters only)
  · Upon Clash Win, trigger Tremor Burst
  · Cannot be Staggered by damage

dataList.name: Clashable Guard
dataList.desc:
- เมื่อชนะในการแตลช: เพิ่มขึด Stagger ของเป้าหมายตามค่าพลังการแคลชสุดท้ายของยูนิตนี้

- เมื่อแพ้ในการแคลช: เหรียญนี้จะไม่ได้รับค่าพลังสุดท้ายจาก Resonance หรือส่วนต่างเลเวลกับสกิลโจมตี

dataList.name: เหรียญทนทาน
